dialogue.head: andromeda
dialogue.text: This is Leena from Andromeda Intergalaktinen. Can you hear me?

dialogue.head: player
dialogue.text: Hey boss! I can hear you.

dialogue.head: andromeda
dialogue.text: Good. I hope you've understood the basics of surfing by now. Otherwise you're going to face some hard times. There's an asteroid swarm coming towards you. Use your gun to avoid getting crushed. I'll call you once you're on safe skies.

dialogue.head: player
dialogue.text: Got it, boss! I will try my best not to die and let you down!
